message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit too steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  While I see you're interested in the product, $12,000 is significantly less than what I can accept. Could you do $18,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14,000. Can we shake on it?
